0100101000100101 0100111100100110 1 -> sum: 1001100101001100, cout: 0
1100010100001010 1010011110000111 1 -> sum: 0110110010010010, cout: 1
1110000101010100 0010101111100101 0 -> sum: 0000110100111001, cout: 1
1001011110000010 0001000101010110 0 -> sum: 1010100011011000, cout: 0
1111011110000111 0010101010111000 0 -> sum: 0010001000111111, cout: 1
0111111111100001 0100000110010101 0 -> sum: 1100000101110110, cout: 0
